DOC.brief_summary: The study aim establish whether measurement respiratory rate take use Anaxsys Technology Ltd Respiratory Counter ( R8 Counter ) equivalent manual respiratory rate count method patient receive oxygen via face mask .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Assessment Use R8 Respiratory Rate Counter Post-Operative Recovery Adults Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age 12 year follow elective surgery general anaesthesia Patients admit emergency surgery Patients ASA rating 3 great Patients receive general anaesthesia Patients expect postoperative recovery le 15 minute
